overview: Shot entirely on HD, Robby D’s Control series is harder, faster, and edgier than anything he has directed before. In volume 6, he captures DP contract star Teagan Presley in an impressive romp with Scott Nails, the buxom 19 year-old Whitney Stevens in a slammin’ anal, lots of tease, more anal, even more anal, and almost three hours of decadent, delicious fuck with smokin’ hot girls.
title: Control 6
